text: If you get rejected for your CMS for Developers Practicum, do you get any feedback as to what you need to fix?

<@U01QVR44MEY> Thank you very much for the information. Is it a free bootcamp or i have to pay for it ? and as i can see this current cohort will end on March 5th. Therefore i belive, i can register for the next cohort after March 5th perhaps? I will then definitely keep track of this, so i don't miss the next cohort. Thank you again for your time.
Yes, you typically receive feedback outlining the areas that need improvement. HubSpot usually provides a review of your submission, highlighting mistakes or missing elements that prevented approval.
Thanks. I got a message not too long after submitting that there was an error but I wasn’t sure what the error was. I resubmitted the link again so I’ll wait and see if I get feedback.
Yeah it’s totally free, and yes you can register for the next one right after this one wraps up
